languages.text: "Тяжко наше служение, требует оно ясности и целеустремленности, коих в ней более нет. Давно я заметил ростки тревог в ней. Но надеялся, что разум ее окажется крепче. Увы, ныне печать обреченности вижу я ясно".

"Our service is demanding. It requires clarity and a sense of purpose that she no longer possesses. Long have I sensed the seeds of anxiety in her, but I hoped her reason would prove stronger and prevail. Alas, now I see the mark of despondence on her. Alas, I know that I am not mistaken."
languages.original_text: "Тяжко наше служение, требует оно ясности и целеустремленности, коих в ней более нет. Давно я заметил ростки тревог в ней. Но надеялся, что разум ее окажется крепче. Увы, ныне печать обреченности вижу я ясно".

traits.locale_text: "Our service is demanding. It requires clarity and a sense of purpose that she no longer possesses. I had long noticed the seeds of anxiety in her. But I hoped her reason would prove stronger and prevail. Alas, now I can see her mark of despondence quite clearly."

"Our service is demanding. It requires clarity and a sense of purpose that she no longer possesses. Long have I sensed the seeds of anxiety in her, but I hoped her reason would prove stronger and prevail. Alas, now I see the mark of despondence on her. Alas, I know that I am not mistaken."

languages.text: « Notre service est exigeant. Il requiert d'avoir l'esprit clair et une détermination, deux éléments qui lui font actuellement défaut. Voilà bien longtemps que je sens en elle les germes de l'anxiété, mais j'espérais que sa raison l'emporterait. Hélas, je vois désormais en elle les stigmates du découragement. Deux fois hélas, je sais que j'ai raison. »
languages.original_text: "Our service is demanding. It requires clarity and a sense of purpose that she no longer possesses. Long have I sensed the seeds of anxiety in her, but I hoped her reason would prove stronger and prevail. Alas, now I see the mark of despondence on her. Alas, I know that I am not mistaken."

traits.locale_text: « Notre service est exigeant. Il requiert d'avoir l'esprit clair et une détermination, deux éléments qui lui font actuellement défaut. Voilà bien longtemps que je sens en elle les germes de l'anxiété, mais j'espérais que sa raison l'emporterait. Hélas, je vois désormais en elle les stigmates du découragement. Deux fois hélas, je sais que j'ai raison. »

languages.text: «Nuestro servicio es exigente. Se necesita una claridad y un sentido del deber que ya no posee. Sentía las semillas de la ansiedad en su ser desde hace mucho, pero había esperado que triunfara la razón. Pero ahora veo en ella la marca del abatimiento. Y lamentablemente sé que estoy en lo cierto».
languages.original_text: "Our service is demanding. It requires clarity and a sense of purpose that she no longer possesses. Long have I sensed the seeds of anxiety in her, but I hoped her reason would prove stronger and prevail. Alas, now I see the mark of despondence on her. Alas, I know that I am not mistaken."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestro servicio es exigente. Se necesita una claridad y un sentido del deber que ya no posee. Sentía las semillas de la ansiedad en su ser desde hace mucho, pero había esperado que triunfara la razón. Pero ahora veo en ella la marca del abatimiento. Y lamentablemente sé que estoy en lo cierto».

languages.text: 「私達の仕事は多大な労力を要します。見分ける力と目的意識が必要ですが…もはや彼女にそれはない。ずっと彼女の中に不安の種を感じていましたが、彼女の理性がもっと育って、その種に勝つことを期待していました。残念ですが、今の彼女には失望の印が見えます。これは間違いではない、本当に残念です」
languages.original_text: "Our service is demanding. It requires clarity and a sense of purpose that she no longer possesses. Long have I sensed the seeds of anxiety in her, but I hoped her reason would prove stronger and prevail. Alas, now I see the mark of despondence on her. Alas, I know that I am not mistaken."

traits.locale_text: 「私達の仕事は多大な労力を要します。見分ける力と目的意識が必要ですが…もはや彼女にそれはない。ずっと彼女の中に不安の種を感じていましたが、彼女の理性がもっと育って、その種に勝つことを期待していました。残念ですが、今の彼女には失望の印が見えます。これは間違いではない、本当に残念です」

languages.text: “我们的侍奉要求很高。我们的信徒必须拥有清晰的职责感、使命感，但她已经失去了这一切。很久以前，我就察觉到了她心中的焦虑，但我以为她的理智会占上风。遗憾的是，此时此刻，我已经在她身上看到了绝望的痕迹。很遗憾，我知道我没有看错。”
languages.original_text: "Our service is demanding. It requires clarity and a sense of purpose that she no longer possesses. Long have I sensed the seeds of anxiety in her, but I hoped her reason would prove stronger and prevail. Alas, now I see the mark of despondence on her. Alas, I know that I am not mistaken."

traits.locale_text: “我们的侍奉要求很高。我们的信徒必须拥有清晰的职责感、使命感，但她已经失去了这一切。很久以前，我就察觉到了她心中的焦虑，但我以为她的理智会占上风。遗憾的是，此时此刻，我已经在她身上看到了绝望的痕迹。很遗憾，我知道我没有看错。”

languages.text: "Unser Dienst ist anspruchsvoll. Er verlangt Klarheit und ein Pflichtbewusstsein, das sie nicht mehr besitzt. Schon lange spüre ich die Saat der Angst in ihr, aber ich hatte stets gehofft, ihre Vernunft wäre stärker und würde siegen. Leider sehe ich nun das Zeichen der Verzagtheit in ihr. Und leider weiß ich, dass ich mich nicht irre."
languages.original_text: "Our service is demanding. It requires clarity and a sense of purpose that she no longer possesses. Long have I sensed the seeds of anxiety in her, but I hoped her reason would prove stronger and prevail. Alas, now I see the mark of despondence on her. Alas, I know that I am not mistaken."

traits.locale_text: "Unser Dienst ist anspruchsvoll. Er verlangt Klarheit und ein Pflichtbewusstsein, das sie nicht mehr besitzt. Schon lange spüre ich die Saat der Angst in ihr, aber ich hatte stets gehofft, ihre Vernunft wäre stärker und würde siegen. Leider sehe ich nun das Zeichen der Verzagtheit in ihr. Und leider weiß ich, dass ich mich nicht irre."

languages.text: "Hizmetimiz meşakkatlidir. Onun artık sahip olmadığı bir berraklığa ve amaç hissine gerek duyar. Yüreğinde nicedir endişenin tohumlarını seziyordum fakat aklının daha güçlü gelip baskın çıkacağını ummuştum. Ne yazık ki onda artık melankolinin belirtilerini görüyorum. Ne yazık ki hatalı olmadığımı biliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Our service is demanding. It requires clarity and a sense of purpose that she no longer possesses. Long have I sensed the seeds of anxiety in her, but I hoped her reason would prove stronger and prevail. Alas, now I see the mark of despondence on her. Alas, I know that I am not mistaken."
